sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Offcanvas from 'react-bootstrap/Offcanvas'; const FilterItems = ({handleClose, show, items}) => { const [colors, setColors] = useState([]) useEffect(()=> { let colorarr = [] const newarrr = [...items] newarrr.map(x => { const singlecolor = { color: x.color, quantity: 1 } const colorExists = colorarr.find(item => item.color === x.color) if(colorExists){ colorExists.quantity++ } else { colorarr.push(singlecolor) } }) setColors(colorarr) }) return ( <> Filter

Filter by category:

 ) } export default FilterItems
